thread.title: Hungary's anti-immigrant leader Orban wins a third term

title: Hungary's anti-immigrant leader Orban wins a third term
text:
Hungary's anti-immigrant leader Orban wins a third term 7:08am BST - 01:26 
Prime Minister Viktor Orban wins a third straight term in power in Sunday elections after his anti-immigration campaign message helps him cinch a strong majority for his party in parliament. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Prime Minister Viktor Orban wins a third straight term in power in Sunday elections after his anti-immigration campaign message helps him cinch a strong majority for his party in parliament.
